name: getLineFragmentInsertionPoints(forCharacterAt:alternatePositions:inDisplayOrder:positions:characterIndexes:)
desc: Returns insertion points in bulk for a specified line fragment.
declaration:
func getLineFragmentInsertionPoints(forCharacterAt charIndex: Int, 
                 alternatePositions aFlag: Bool, 
                     inDisplayOrder dFlag: Bool, 
                          positions: UnsafeMutablePointer<CGFloat>?, 
                   characterIndexes charIndexes: UnsafeMutablePointer<Int>?) -> Int
